fields.headline: G Student website
fields.bodyText: What we're looking for Innovative web content that exploits the strength of the medium, and displays a clear identity and understanding of the audience. We want to see ease of use combined with good design. First prize £500 and a week's work experience at Guardian Unlimited for the winning editor. Runner-up £250 How to enter The closing date for this category was Friday May 5 2006. This early deadline is to allow judges to monitor the sites over time.
